meanings.sent1: The hidden treasure was indiscoverable by the explorers.
meanings.sent2: The lost city remained indiscoverable for centuries.
meanings.sent3: The elusive unicorn was said to be indiscoverable even by the most skilled trackers.
meanings.sent4: The truth behind the legend was as indiscoverable as a needle in a haystack.
meanings.sent5: The mysterious island was shrouded in an indiscoverable mist.

meanings.sent1: The missing key was indiscoverable in the cluttered room.
meanings.sent2: The rare flower species was indiscoverable in the dense forest.
meanings.sent3: The cat thought its toy was indiscoverable under the couch.
meanings.sent4: The answer to the riddle seemed as indiscoverable as a hidden message in a bottle.
meanings.sent5: The ancient artifact was buried deep in an indiscoverable tomb.
